document_data.name: Frostbite
document_data.home: [[Dorn's Deep|Wyrm's Tooth glacier]], [[Spine of the World]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Frostbite''' was a [[white dragon]] [[wyrmling]] that inhabited caves within the [[Dorn's Deep|Wyrm's Tooth glacier]] atop the [[Spine of the World]] in the late 13{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: Befitting his youth and the savagery of his race, Frostbite considered both [[human]]s and [[demihuman]]s to be nothing more than food and felt no remorse towards eating them. Whenever he spoke [[Common]] it came out in a very broken form.
document_data.Possessions: Frostbite held a [[gemstone]] in his possession.
document_data.History: Some time in [[1281 DR]], the [[frost giant]] [[Joril Frostbeard]] convinced Frostbite and the rest of his pack of white wyrms to feign death and then kill his unsuspecting father [[Kreg Frostbeard]] so that he could assume control over his tribe. In return for their cooperation, Joril regularly fed them the human and demihuman slaves that his tribe shared with the glacier's intelligent [[salamander]]s, much to the chagrin of some members of his tribe.
document_data.Relationships: Frostbite and his pack of white wyrms lived in a tense sort of peace alongside the frost giants within Wyrm's Tooth glacier.
